lead_paragraph: The San Antonio Spurs signed center Jackie Butler, a restricted free agent who spent the past two seasons with the Knicks. Last season, the 6-foot-10 Butler played in 53 games, averaging 5.3 points and 3.3 rebounds in 13.5 minutes.
